Topic.Title: I'm back with candy and better coding skills

Posts.EditableText: Hi people! Long time no see. Just thought I'd jump in and warn you that I am continuing work on WAKE. Haven't had a lot of time. Started a new job as a Software QC Engineer. I had to learn to program in C# on the fly, and now I'm surprised with how good I've gotten, when considering that I taught myself most of what I now know. Never realized things like the XAML in these projects. Or that this was made using Java (Java right?). I sort of just plugged along not really knowing what I was doing. But these last few months have taught me a ton that I hope will expedite my work on WAKE. So I'm happy to be back! Talk to you soon
Posts.HTML:
Hi people! Long time no see.

Just thought I'd jump in and warn you that I am continuing work on WAKE. Haven't had a lot of time. Started a new job as a Software QC Engineer. I had to learn to program in C# on the fly, and now I'm surprised with how good I've gotten, when considering that I taught myself most of what I now know.

Never realized things like the XAML in these projects. Or that this was made using Java (Java right?).

I sort of just plugged along not really knowing what I was doing. But these last few months have taught me a ton that I hope will expedite my work on WAKE.

So I'm happy to be back! Talk to you soon

Posts.EditableText: You're asking if Quest is written in Java? No. It's written in c# as far as I know, and I think it might use mono but don't quote me on that. I can't remember off the top of my head, lol.
Posts.HTML: You're asking if Quest is written in Java? No. It's written in c# as far as I know, and I think it might use mono but don't quote me on that. I can't remember off the top of my head, lol.

Posts.EditableText: Welcome back man... can I has some candy?
Posts.HTML: Welcome back man... can I has some candy?

Posts.EditableText: C#? I haven't had to use a single semi-colon in Quest that I can remember. Or do you mean the Quest program itself used C#? Sure, I hand candy out of the back of my old brown van. I spray painted "candy" on the side (It's totally legit). So here's a hand full of already unwrapped candy (I wanted to save you the time for unwrapping it).
